entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.37.0 July Content and Date Adjustments
entry.content:
API

  • Content: New items, backgrounds, etc for July 2025 (@CuriousMagpie and @beffymaroo)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)
  • Chore: Adjust event and sale dates for better match to user activity (@CuriousMagpie and @SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.37.1 Performance and TT Fixes
entry.content:
API

  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Fix: Update Time Travelers shop to display seasonal backgrounds (@CuriousMagpie)
  • Fix: Correct syntax in Sprite component that was filing lots of Vue errors (@phillipthelen)

Scripts

  • Perf: Update Group Plan cron process to use a simpler query and filter found groups post hoc (@SabreCat)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.37.2 Password Change Fixes
entry.content:
API

  • Fix: Invalidate outstanding sessions upon change of password, by generating a new API token (@negue)
  • Fix: Provide a language-agnostic code along with 401 invalid session errors (@Hafizzle)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

Client

  • Fix: Reload page after changing password, now that API token is invalidated in this flow (@Hafizzle)
  • Fix: Send reset password form only once when using Enter to submit (@phillipthelen)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.38.0 August Content and X-Client Requirement
entry.content:
API

  • Feature (BREAKING): If server has ENFORCE_CLIENT_HEADER config variable set, it rejects any API request that is missing x-client headers (@phillipthelen)
  • Content: Backgrounds, gear, etc. for August 2025 (@CuriousMagpie and @beffymaroo)
  • Fix: Correctly handle deletion of tasks from legacy Group Plans (@phillipthelen)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)

entry.title: New release for Habitica: v5.38.1 Challenge Categories in Content API
entry.content:
API

  • Feature: Include categoryOptions, i.e., the list of available categories to apply to Groups and Challenges, in /content API response (@SabreCat)
  • Chore: Locale files updated (@weblate contributors)
